column4: How can I upgrade Firefox out of beta without losing everything I have on it, like bookmarks and such?
thanks, I'll take a look at that :)
; but if you runing hardy you should have ff3 final now
: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
: do you have security repos open?
I have no clue, how can I check?
the only one enabled is universe
: after you make chanfes sava and close file and  sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
bingo. Now I've got some things being updated :)
thanks much! I'm going afk for a bit while this all installs. Quite a bit of stuff it seems..
